job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in computer science or similar field of study

jd:
Job Details

.NET Backend Developer

Long Term Contract

Houston, TX (Onsite)

Key points:

Summary: The Senior Software Engineer for Multi-Chem will be responsible for setting technical direction for cloud adoption and maintaining constantly changing architectures of existing on-prem apps. This individual must be able to define best practices for complex solutions and develop migration of existing on-premise applications to cloud architectures. This individual must also have strong consultative and communication skills. The individual will work with different stakeholders.

Qualifications:

- 10+ years working with information technology
- 5+ years working with cloud technology
- Expert in cloud technologies, especially Azure
- Good experience in Cloud methodologies, Terraform and ADO
- Strong interpersonal and consultative skills
- Bachelor’s degree in computer science or similar field of study
- Local to Houston area

Experience:

- Significant experience in design and development roles
- Strong background in Azure DevOps and DevSecOps related responsibilities including: CI/CD pipeline architecture/creation, working with ADO/Terraform, best deployment practices, and microservices
- Significant experience with transformations from traditional operational methodologies to DevSecOps
- Experience with Agile development practices
- Strength in App performance with SQL/Entity-framework
- CI / CD pipelines for Web applications
- Strong C#/.Net software development background in an enterprise environment
- Previous experience creating proof of concepts from scratch based off requirements/application infrastructure to propose, create, and implement solutions
- Experience in working/leading onsite/offsite team, and some task planning activities.
- Experience/exposure to both Waterfall and Agile/Scrum practices and tools.
- Strong API experience (defining API specifications, creating APIs, and integrating APIs into 3rd

Plusses:

- Background in Technical Design/Software Architect work
- Previous Oil and Gas industry experience
